disclaimer_term.list: Cookie: small amount of data generated by a website and saved by your web browser. It is used to identify your browser,provide analytics, remember information about you such as your language preference or login information.

affiliate_links.list: Any/all of the links on Funtravia are affiliate links of which we receive a small commission from sales of certain items, but the price is the same for you. As Funtravia has grown, so have costs associated with running and maintaining it, and affiliate links are a way we help offset these costs.
If we post an affiliate link to a product, it is something that we personally use, support and would recommend without an affiliate link.
Unless otherwise noted, all reviews are of items we have purchased and we are not paid or compensated in any way.
